version_description:
■一部星5アクセサリの第二効果の調整
■キャラクター所持枠の上限を拡張
■アビリティ表示の変更と一部数値調整
■共闘クエストでのAUTO機能の追加
■共闘クエストでのオンライン開放時の募集条件追加
■共闘クエストのパーティ確認画面でのチャットの追加
■クエストでのフレンド申請方法の変更
■クエスト中の確認ポップアップの追加
■バトルのAI改善
■バトルの仕様変更
■オプション「必殺技演出のスキップ」を廃止
■プレゼントBOXの改修
<

■一部星5アクセサリの第二効果の調整
■キャラクター所持枠の上限を拡張
■アビリティ表示の変更と一部数値調整
■共闘クエストでのAUTO機能の追加
■共闘クエストでのオンライン開放時の募集条件追加
■共闘クエストのパーティ確認画面でのチャットの追加
■クエストでのフレンド申請方法の変更
■クエスト中の確認ポップアップの追加
■バトルのAI改善
■バトルの仕様変更
■オプション「必殺技演出のスキップ」を廃止
■プレゼントBOXの改修
<

- All Friends now displayed in the Ally list
- Adjustments to various Co-Op functions

Issues Fixed
- Issue with Test Play when Dominant Hand is set to left.
- An Unknown Error occurs when strengthening Accessories.
- Auto mode cannot be

- All Friends now displayed in the Ally list
- Adjustments to various Co-Op functions

Issues Fixed
- Issue with Test Play when Dominant Hand is set to left.
- An Unknown Error occurs when strengthening Accessories.
- Auto mode cannot be

- Home Screen revamped.
- Max Accessory power up materials increased.
- Chat function disabled during single-player quests.

Issue Fixed
- Continue button shown on Co-Op Quest results screen.
- Accessory models not appearing on the Acces

- Home Screen revamped.
- Max Accessory power up materials increased.
- Chat function disabled during single-player quests.

Issue Fixed
- Continue button shown on Co-Op Quest results screen.
- Accessory models not appearing on the Acces

When you have no more Soul Tickets or Battle Passes, the “0” icon will now turn red.

Issues Fixed
Co-Op
- Set Chat button inoperative on preparation screen
- Unable to close Chat if a player leaves the Lobby while the Chat function is open

When you have no more Soul Tickets or Battle Passes, the “0” icon will now turn red.

Issues Fixed
Co-Op
- Set Chat button inoperative on preparation screen
- Unable to close Chat if a player leaves the Lobby while the Chat function is open

- New combo system
Attacking enemies with Melee or Ranged Attack Resistance will no longer break your combo string.

Issue Fixed
- Attack timing being off due to processing failures during Brave Battles

See in-game notices for more deta

- New combo system
Attacking enemies with Melee or Ranged Attack Resistance will no longer break your combo string.

Issue Fixed
- Attack timing being off due to processing failures during Brave Battles

See in-game notices for more deta

- Max rechargeable Soul Tickets increased
- Use 5 Soul Tickets simultaneously function added
- Previous Brave Battle team automatically selected
- New Accessories added
- New items added to Kon’s Corner
- Adjustments to charged attacks

- Max rechargeable Soul Tickets increased
- Use 5 Soul Tickets simultaneously function added
- Previous Brave Battle team automatically selected
- New Accessories added
- New items added to Kon’s Corner
- Adjustments to charged attacks

Issues Fixed
- "No Affiliation" filters
- Limited events still displayed after being completed
- Home Screen characters not displayed correctly
- Game freezing before single-player boss battle
- "Battle" button displayed in Japanese

Issues Fixed
- "No Affiliation" filters
- Limited events still displayed after being completed
- Home Screen characters not displayed correctly
- Game freezing before single-player boss battle
- "Battle" button displayed in Japanese

Issues Fixed
- Kenpachi (Thousand-Year Blood War version) freezing during Brave Battles
- Issue with Strong Attack Recharge Time Soul Traits when using some Special Moves
- Some characters’ super-strong attack or Special Move boost effects not tr

Issues Fixed
- Kenpachi (Thousand-Year Blood War version) freezing during Brave Battles
- Issue with Strong Attack Recharge Time Soul Traits when using some Special Moves
- Some characters’ super-strong attack or Special Move boost effects not tr

- Guild function added
- Accessory Fusion and 6-star Awakening animations now skippable
- Faster chat opening
- Various design changes

Issues Fixed
- Loading problems with iOS 11
- Stamina reducing Accessories not registering a minus

- Guild function added
- Accessory Fusion and 6-star Awakening animations now skippable
- Faster chat opening
- Various design changes

Issues Fixed
- Loading problems with iOS 11
- Stamina reducing Accessories not registering a minus

- Faster chat opening

- Faster chat opening

非常感謝您遊玩BLEACH Brave Souls。

■版本更新內容
・追加新功能
・改善部分功能
・修復部分問題

※詳情請見遊戲中公告。

今後也請您繼續支持BLEACH Brave Souls。
